title: The scouter says my ping was over 9000..seriously...hit 20k
body:
And this isn't just me, seems 1 out of 5 matches has someone who is linking their ping spikes in chat, this wouldn't be especially problematic if not for the fact that not only do you get a loss  But so do the other 4 members on my team.

I know we cant very well put in a "My ping is ridiculous" surrender at 6 minutes command, because it could be exploited for say...jungle invade fail giving the enemy team 3 kills or something, but there has to be something that can be done, and again I stress this is more for the team than the individual.

I am open to suggestions and testimonials, I am sure we have all experienced this sort of thing at some point, hello my Summoner name is Lios Ashenblade, and I am a victim of Lag.

replies.body:
It's a shame hearing your teammates as well are getting bad ping, but unfortunately a high ms can be caused by myriad potential problems.

Let's for now focus on your ping and see if we can find something that's causing it to spike together. For starters, always suggest using a hard connection over wifi since that alone is so much better. Next, do you know if your firewall is or has interfered with LoL at anypoint? Let's make sure it isn't now by running through these steps in [**our guide here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq3). Then join a Custom game to test the ping and see if it still goes haywire. :)

Happened again tonight, one match  completely fine, everything is perfect, the next match 10k ping spikes and DCs nonstop...its completely unpredictable, to the point I am not sure I can even bother playing ranked.

Granted I live in a small rural town, and 26mps is by no means a super mega fast speed, but it is more than sufficient to run league, I checked on 3 different speed tests and got the same result, immediately after losing another ranked match to unplayable ping spikes...Is there a doc I can print to show you my computers logs of said events or what?

We do have a tool that can [**read your logs**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader), but unfortunately there's very little I can do with them on Boards. What you can do is use that to collect information for our Tech Support team and [**ticket them over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for more in depth help using that info.

I'm assuming that troubleshooting your firewall didn't help you out? :(

Yeah the firewall troubleshooting didn't seem to help, I rebooted my system, and did a power cycle on the router, and still had a handful of low spikes, around 500 ping in an aram, I am going to contact the dude I rent from, see if he minds if I run a line from my living room to the box, through these walls, and try it that way as a last resort, obviously a "Aha, we found the glitch with your issue" is far more cost effective lol, as a general troubleshooting rule, I do the cheapest fixes first, and I do appreciate the assistance you have offered to this point, and the speed at which you have responded

As a fellow renter I completely understand prioritizing solutions monetarily. xD In that case I totally recommend that ticket then. An in depth look into those logs from Tech may yield something useful! :)

I haven't had an issue until here recently, say the last 2-3 weeks, and I have been playing league since Shen was a new champ lol, however this PC is only 2 years old I believe, I have made sure to check my connection speed on 3 different sites as well just to make SURE my ISP isnt giving me fake numbers, and since the ping spikes are irregular, I am not sure how exactly to test for them, far as I can tell the firewall isn't hindering league, and tho I live in a small rural area, with "slow" internet service, slower still since its a small town in the US.

That aside, I am on a wifi connection, which I would just run wire to change, but I do not crawl under houses, and as far as I can tell there is no attic access <I rent the place so any construction or remodel has to be something I can take back out if need be> lemme go triple check these steps tho just to eliminate what I am able
